name: Spaceman Gets the Job
description:
My 2D platformer project for the Game Design and Development Course 2. 

Modifications:

- Designed the Main Menu to look a little bit more pleasing. 

- Added Intro and Victory scenes to give players more context of what is happening

- Created 4 playable levels and each level has the progression of difficulty and story.

- Added voiceovers using Text to Speech
